name: Real Nitro Racing: Extreme Fast Warrior
name_original: Real Nitro Racing: Extreme Fast Warrior
description:
Are you ready to tear up the asphalt as you race along the city streets?

Real Nitro Racing is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. You must race your car through the city as fast as you can - but watch out! There are some dangerous drivers trying to run you off the road!

How long can you keep racing and avoid the other drivers? How many coins can you collect along the way? Tap the screen when you need a boost. You'll start going faster and faster, so watch out for the traps of the road!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock cool race cars for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect cash to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Real Nitro Racing right now while it's 100% FREE!
